Title: Han Stormstout
Description:
There will be time for mourning later. For now, there are other Stormstouts to be found.

They say that Han Stormstout was last seen exploring Kor'vess. I suspect he headed into that mantid burrow, just across the way.

You should meet me down there, $n. I don't doubt that I can handle a few mantid by myself... but I'd feel better with you by my side.
ObjectivesText: Find Han Stormstout in the Morrowchamber beneath Kor'vess.
CompletionText: I think I see someone over there, but I can't seem to get across these amber beams.
RewardText:
First Evie, now Han.

I was too late again.
